repairedDockerfile:

#
# docker build -t <LABEL> .
# docker run --cap-add=NET_ADMIN -t <LABEL> -p <APP_PORT>,<API_PORT> \
# impaired_network_server -t tcp -l kernel -i auto -p <APP_PORT> -a <API_PORT>

FROM ubuntu:14.04

RUN apt-get -y update
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python iptables git && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python-setuptools python-dev build-essential python-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install libnetfilter-queue-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN mkdir /src
WORKDIR /src

RUN git clone https://github.com/google/packet-queue.git

WORKDIR /src/packet-queue

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir .

WORKDIR /src
RUN rm -rf /src/packet-queue

RUN groupadd whiterabbit
RUN echo "%whiterabbit ALL=(root) NOPASSWD: "`which impaired_network_server` >> /etc/sudoers.d/whiterabbit
